DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , single center , adaptive single ascend dose ( Part 1 ) multiple ascend dose ( Part 2 ) study design assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetic , pharmacodynamics follow oral administration RO6889450 versus placebo healthy volunteer . The anticipated duration study approximately 18 week .
